title: La Liga Laughs: Real Madrid, Quique Sanchez Flores and goal celebrations
description: Jon Driscoll takes a light-hearted look at the weekend's football in Spain.
content: Hit play on the video above to see how some players and managers reacted to Real Madrid's latest La Liga defeat.You can also see some of Lionel Messi's skills in the rain, plus a look at Quique Sanchez Flores turning down Stoke.There's also a range of celebrations from the weekend, including one fairly disgusting one, plus a great moment involving a camera right at the end of the video.Hit play on the video at the top of the page to enjoy some La Liga Laughs for yourself.
